downloadDescription: The guide contains a pattern catalog of 18 common integration patterns, including implementations that use BizTalk Server 2004, Host Integration Server 2004, ASP.NET, Visual Studio .NET, Visio 2003, and the .NET Framework.
detailsSection:
Integration Patterns is the third patterns release in the pattern & practices series from Microsoft. Building on the application patterns presented in Enterprise Solution Patterns Using Microsoft .NET, this guide applies patterns to solve integration problems within the enterprise.
The guide contains a pattern catalog of 18 common integration patterns, including implementations that use BizTalk Server 2004, Host Integration Server 2004, ASP.NET, Visual Studio .NET, Visio 2003, and the .NET Framework.
installInstructionSection: Click the download link and view the pdf file using Adobe Reader 4.0 or later.
